subject:
Re: Cutoff for major changes to 3.0.26 is scheduled for Monday, June
 4
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Michael Adam wrote:

> Good to know. Do you have plans yet as to how (from where)
> 3_0_27 will be branched? 3_0 or 3_0_27?

I expect we'll branch SAMBA_3_0_27 from SAMBA_3_0 since the
we already have most of the PIDL work merged to SAMBA_3_0_26.
There's a few things that exist solely in the 3_0 branch so
we'll have to discuss how everyone feels about those features
when it is time to branch.






cheers, jerry
